name: Reliance Health
headline: We make healthcare in emerging markets affordable and accessible
description: Reliance Health uses technology to make quality healthcare delightful, affordable and accessible in emerging markets. Through an integrated approach that includes affordable health insurance, telemedicine and a combination of partner and proprietary healthcare facilities, Reliance Health offers innovative healthcare solutions that meet the needs of emerging markets including Nigeria, Egypt and growing

founders.name: Matthew Mayaki, Founder/Senior Vice President Product
founders.description: Matthew Mayaki is a software engineer with over 5 years of experience in the industry. Having started at a very young age, he has built battle-tested skills in both design and engineering and developed a passion for art and creativity, which he uses in solving everyday problems. He's a founding member of Reliance Health Inc. and currently serves as the VP Engineering, where he along with his team members handle the development and maintenance of the company's mobile and web infrastructures.

# Employee healthcare reimagined
Improving the lives of staff in emerging markets with innovative health benefits fit for any business.
[LET'S TALK ](https://www.getreliancehealth.com/</contact/>)
![home_hero_cutout](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/home_hero_cutout.jpg)
  * ![cowrywise_logo](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/cowrywise_logo.svg)
  * ![Nivea_logo](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Nivea_logo.svg)
  * ![Jumia_logo](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Jumia_logo.svg)
  * ![Paystack_logo](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Paystack_logo.svg)


## 4,000+ businesses and 200,000 people rely on us globally
## Health plans to fit your business
Whatever your industry, whatever your size. Our health plans give employees and their families the support they need. From proactive treatments and neonatal care to coverage for emergencies and chronic conditions.
[ABOUT OUR HEALTH PLANS ](https://www.getreliancehealth.com/</health-plans/>)
![health-plans](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/health-plans.jpg)
## Telemedicine and more by phone
With the Reliance Health app, plan members enjoy immediate access to doctors, with virtual appointments. And prescriptions for delivery at home or work, meaning less interruption to to their busy lives. The app gives members access to eligible providers and live chat with our service team.
![telemedicine](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/telemedicine.jpg)
![home_rfc_cutout](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/home_rfc_cutout.jpg)
## Pioneering global services
Reliance Health works with 3,800+ health and wellness partners to provide a range of high-quality clinical services conforming to global standards and best practices—including consultative, diagnostic and specialist care.
[ABOUT OUR CLINICAL SERVICES ](https://www.getreliancehealth.com/</clinical-services/>)
## Medical expertise and technical knowhow
Keeping people healthy is our sole focus, our expertise, our passion. We help you promote healthier lifestyles and avoid costly interventions with technology-backed solutions to curative and preventative care.
[ABOUT RELIANCE HEALTH ](https://www.getreliancehealth.com/</about/>)
![medical-expertise](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/medical-expertise.jpg)
## See what our community says
When we bring our customers together with the providers they need, everyone benefits. But don’t take our word for it. 
  * ![Orange Dot](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/themes/getreliancehealthWPTheme-3.5.5/assets/images/quote-orange.svg)

Elagi Clinics
Medical Provider, Egypt
  * ![Orange Dot](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/themes/getreliancehealthWPTheme-3.5.5/assets/images/quote-orange.svg)
#### With Reliance HMO, I can always get in touch with a doctor even if I don't want to go to the hospital.
Seun Olanpeleke, CFO, Creative Intelligence Group
Advertising, Nigeria
  * ![Orange Dot](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/themes/getreliancehealthWPTheme-3.5.5/assets/images/quote-orange.svg)
#### My headache has been solved, my staff can access good healthcare.
A. Adeyoyin, HR manager, Beremont Group

  * ![Orange Dot](https://getreliancehealth.com/wp-content/themes/getreliancehealthWPTheme-3.5.5/assets/images/quote-orange.svg)

We’re opening up access to quality, reliable health services in growing economies.

generated_description:
**Reliance Health Overview**

Founded in 2016 and emerging from the Y Combinator Batch W17, Reliance Health is on a mission to revolutionize healthcare in emerging markets by making it affordable and easily accessible. Based in Lagos, Nigeria, the company has grown into a team of 384 dedicated employees, driven by a commitment to enhance healthcare delivery across countries like Nigeria and Egypt.

**What They Do**

At its core, Reliance Health leverages technology to transform the healthcare landscape. Their integrated approach combines affordable health insurance with telemedicine services and a network of both partner and proprietary healthcare facilities. This innovative model addresses the unique healthcare challenges faced in emerging markets.

The company currently offers a range of services:
- **Health Plans**: Tailored to meet the needs of varying businesses, offering everything from emergency coverage to preventive care.
- **Telemedicine**: With their user-friendly app, members gain prompt access to healthcare professionals through virtual appointments, reducing disruptions in their daily lives.
- **Clinical Services**: Reliance collaborates with over 3,800 health and wellness partners to provide high-quality clinical services that adhere to global standards.

**Community Impact**

Reliance Health has made significant strides in empowering over 200,000 individuals and serving more than 4,000 businesses globally. Their focus is not just on healthcare provision but also on cultivating healthier lifestyles and improving employee health experiences. 

Customer testimonials underscore their effectiveness, with many praising the peace of mind brought by the Reliance HMO, the convenience of their dashboard services, and the innovative technology that distinguishes them in the healthcare sector.

**Where to Learn More**

For those interested in discovering more about Reliance Health, either as potential clients or simply curious minds, their website is a treasure trove of information. You can explore their various health plans, clinical services, and also dive into their resources and blog for insights into the healthcare industry.

Visit [Reliance Health](https://www.getreliancehealth.com) to get started on your journey to improved healthcare solutions. In a world where access to quality healthcare is often a luxury, Reliance Health is making strides to ensure it’s within everyone's reach.
